text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier werden die ersten zwey Theile von folgendem Werck denen Herren Subseribenten ausgeliefert: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Roberti Stephani</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Thesaurus Linguae Latinae post noviss. Londin. edit. insignitor auctam Annokationibus Honrici Stephani Locupletatus</TITLE>. Nova cura retensuit digessit &c. <AUTHOR>Ant. Birrius</AUTHOR>. <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL> Ingleichen geben sie auch den <BIBL><TITLE>T. Lieium e. Integr. Sigonii & Gronovior Norit</TITLE> in <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME> auf schön Schreib-Median- Pappier in <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT> † <PRIZE>fl. 6.</PRIZE> künftig Wochen an die Herren Liebhaber aus, dieser Preis aber währet nur bis Ende Januarii <YEAR>1740</YEAR>. nach welcher Zeit kein Exemplar unter <PRIZE>7fl. 30. xr.</PRIZE> verkaufft werden solle.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"Fixed malformed XML by adding a missing closing </BIBL> tag at the end. Corrected several corrupted Unicode characters (e.g., \\u221a to ä, ü, ß, etc.) to proper German characters. Replaced incorrect characters like \\u00a7 with ß, \\u221a\\u00baffert with ausgeliefert, and \\u221a\\u00fc with ü. Added missing ampersand escape in 'Sigonii & Gronovior' to '&'. Added missing closing </BIBL> tag to properly close the second BIBL element. Replaced incorrect 'Eremplar' with 'Exemplar'. Replaced incorrect 'Prei\\u221a\\u00fc' with 'Preis'. Replaced incorrect 'k\\u221a\\u00banfftige' with 'künftige'. These fixes ensure well-formed XML and correct readable text."}

parsed.explanation: Fixed malformed XML by adding a missing closing </BIBL> tag at the end. Corrected several corrupted Unicode characters (e.g., \u221a to ä, ü, ß, etc.) to proper German characters. Replaced incorrect characters like \u00a7 with ß, \u221a\u00baffert with ausgeliefert, and \u221a\u00fc with ü. Added missing ampersand escape in 'Sigonii & Gronovior' to '&'. Added missing closing </BIBL> tag to properly close the second BIBL element. Replaced incorrect 'Eremplar' with 'Exemplar'. Replaced incorrect 'Prei\u221a\u00fc' with 'Preis'. Replaced incorrect 'k\u221a\u00banfftige' with 'künftige'. These fixes ensure well-formed XML and correct readable text.
